channel.title: Miscs on Trang Bui
channel.description: Recent content in Miscs on Trang Bui

item.title: News
item.description: Some news and online articles featuring me. 2024/06/05: I obtained the Honorable Mention in the Student Research Oral Presentation Competition in Data Science and Analytics at the SSC Annual Meeting, 2024. 2024/04/10: I received the Distinguished Service Award for the UWaterloo’s Women in Mathematics Directed Reading Program. During my time here, I coordinated three projects and mentored four undergraduate students. 2024/03/01: My paper: General Additive Network Effect Model was featured in the “Design and Analysis of Experiments for Data Science” webinar by the New England Journal of Statistics in Data Science.
